title: Web Exposure Rating Dashboard
description: The Reflectiz Web Exposure Rating Dashboard provides an overview of your Reflectiz Rating Data. This dashboard offers actionable insights to help you manage and secure your websites.

definition.content:
### About This Dashboard  

Welcome to your Reflectiz **Web Exposure Rating Dashboard**, your centralized hub for an overview of your Reflectiz Rating Data. This dashboard offers actionable insights to help you manage and secure your websites.  

**To get the most accurate and relevant insights**:  
1.**Filter the dashboard by a specific site and scan** to narrow the data to your desired site.  
1. In the "Website Scan Overview", under the "Last Scan Per Site" table, select the latest scan for you desired site.
1. Select "Template Variables", then set both the `reflectiz.site` & `reflectiz.scan` variables.
1. Optional: Select the host using the filter at the top left of the dashboard. By selecting a Datadog host, your can review risks associated with any website running on that host.

### About the Rating Feature  

Exposure Rating is Reflectiz’s grading system to assess risk exposure for websites. With Reflectiz, you can obtain an Exposure Rating for every website, application, and domain in context within your web environments, benchmarked against industry leaders in your sector. 

The Reflectiz Rating system provides a score between 1 and 4, where 1*indicates significant risks that require immediate attention and 4 represents an optimal state with minimal risks.  

Each rating is directly linked to detailed logs, allowing you to drill down into the risks associated with specific apps or domains. Click on a rating to view the related logs and address any highlighted issues proactively.  

For more in-depth analysis and additional features, visit the [Reflectiz Platform](https://dashboard.reflectiz.com/main/dashboard).
